body: Homie with the hat is the real trooper of this one. Not only did he take futa cock but he kept his rationality and STILL wanted to fuck her at the end while the other 2 became bitches. Good art  nice scenes, shit story. 4/10. Hat homie gets a 100/10. Receive and Return like I always say.
